page.title: 07TV SHOP AT BLOFIELD CORNER
page.content: Situated in Blofield Corner there is a Snelings T.V. rental,repair place and shop. In it they sell 6 kinds of{T.V's and Hi-Fi's as well as laser discs and blank{video}tapes. They have a 135ft. tall{aerial}which can broadcast a range of 25 miles. They employ 19 workers who work from 9 a.m.-6 p.m. 6 days a week. The company at Blofield has been around for 30 years. They have a 4' diameter dish. This will pick up radio and T.V. waves beamed down from{satellites.}They also rent T.V's to the public.
